extendedInfo.description: ASL Lite for Android allows you to review about 100 American Sign Language vocabulary. The ASL signs have descriptions which can be reviewed. You can NOW purchase ASL Ultimate which has 1400 words in the Android Market.

reviews.comment: This is one of the worse apps I\'ve ever purchased. I\'ve must have installed and installed it 10 times because the pictures do not download.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app was awesome, not sure what happened but now we can\'t open the app!!! Removed! Was 5 star now 1!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Lost the images. What is up? If the images aren\'t working here, will it be the same way if we buy the apps? Very skeptical.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is prolly the only app ive ever commented on..this is really amazing..i learned the alphabet in 20 mins..keep up the good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very helpful for beginners but needs more words. Is there a more expanded version?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: 3 stars for great potential. But oh boy. it doesnt even have the word \'how\' i noticed. And signs vary so having other versions for words is necessary
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good for beginners. It needs to communicate more with a s l pro. It does not have enough new signs
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is a great app. Cant wait till the other 2 upgrades, just dont kill the app by being out of the water on cost remember we r all in the same boat
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not sure what WINDY is talking about but for beginners this app is excellent and all are commonly used words, it is RID approved by this interpreter:)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have the droid and i had this app on my phone before and it worked fine but i just recently downloaded it again and the pix dont show up at all!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This app makes it very easy to learn. My wife and I learned the whole lite library in basically a day. Buying the full version.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: The pictures are there but you have to download them when you 1st dwnload app. Saves to pic gallery. Not enough words. Otherwise a good beginners app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best interactive app. out there. Love it, and the quizes! AWESOME job! I\'ve already learned over 50 new words!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So broken, if you change the profile the screen advances to the next word
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Is ok. Basic but not universal. Need more makaton signs rather than asl, or baliffs. But the pictures and descriptions are very good !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay
reviews.comment: This app is just okay. It\'s lacking some very common words such as Mother, Aunt, and Uncle.  However it does have father.  It seriously needs a lot more words!
reviews.author: Kristen Littlefield

reviews.comment: Not a great app...not enough signs stored on resource list...looking forward to pro version with a dictionary like interface.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m Deaf and communicate in ASL.  This \"ok\" if youre just curious but not very useful in a conversation.  Good for thank you and hello but then what?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good App, thankful to have it. Wish there was a happy-medium between \"Lite\" 100words and \"ultimate\" 1400words... maybe give Lite 500 words?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s good but wish it had simple sentence options
reviews.author: A Google User
